name: Dummy
title: Dummy
text: Can not delete last object of it's kind!

name: Caps
title: Stat Caps
text: HP: 20 for T1, 25 for T2{br}All Others: 10{br}All Units have MOV Growths!

name: Equations
title: Equations
text: Hit: SKL*20 + LCK*5{br}Avo: SPD*5 + LCK*5{br}Crit Avo: LCK*10{br}Doubling Threshold: 1 SPD{br}Crit Damage: x2{br}Effectiveness: x3

name: Wep. Ranks
title: Weapon Ranks
text: Weapons don't require weapon ranks. Instead, characters gain Hit at rank A and S:{br}{br}A Rank: +10 Hit{br}S Rank: +20 Hit

name: Burning
title: Burning
text: Saraid's Firestarter lights tiles on fire!{br}The fire spreads next turn to adjacent tiles.{br}Units starting their turn on a burning tile take 4 damage.{br}Also, they suffer -1 SKL/SPD/DEF/RES.

name: Free Actions
title: Free Actions
text: Any item, ability, or command with yellow text doesn't end a player unit's turn. They can even attack afterwards!

name: Bolster
title: Bolster
text: Corridon's Bolster ability gives an ally temporary HP for 2 turns.{br}At the end of the effect their Max HP reduces to its original value.

name: Building
title: Building Supports
text:
Units can support with any other playable unit but are limited to 1 support partner at a time.{br}Supports are unlocked after a chapter where both units are deployed.
Each pair only has 1 support rank.{br}If either unit dies, the support is broken; allowing the surviving unit to support with a different unit.

name: Bonuses
title: Support Bonuses
text:
Units gain a bonus based on their partner's affinity while within 3 tiles of eachother.
Fire: +1 Damage{br}Wind:+1 Attack Speed{br}Ice: -1 Damage Received{br}Thunder: +10 Crit{br}Light: +10 Avoid{br}Dark: +10 Hit
